question: Why is Kota Bogor, Indonesia known as the "City of Rain"?
true_answer: Because it has a very high rainfall.
asked_question_translated: Miksi Indonesian Kota Bogor tunnetaan nimell채 "Sateen kaupunki"?
answer: Indonesian Bogor tunnetaan nimell채 "Sateen kaupunki" sen usein esiintyvien ja voimakkaiden sadem채채rien vuoksi.
answer_translated_eng: Bogor in Indonesia is known as the "Rain City" because of its frequent and heavy rainfall.
